sections.description: Fetches raw html from remote URL and injects into current page.
sections.installation: Click the activate button and that's it.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.1 released on August 12th, 2023

  • Inline styles for HTML tag
  • Inject classes for HTML tag

v1.0 released on July 2nd, 2023

  • New shortcode [remote_page_inject url=""]
  • HTML head response injected with wp_head hook.
  • HTML body response injected where shortcode is placed.
  • HTML response stored in cache and refreshed daily.
